names.english: warm yang and astringe jing decoction
names.commonEnglish: Warm Yang and Astringe Jing Decoction

actions: Warms Ming Men Fire and assists Heart, Kidney and Spleen Yang.
With Rou Gui, for Deficiency of Ming Men Fire with impotence or infertility.
Warms the Kidneys, Spleen and Heart, strengthens Yang and Ming Men Fire and leads the Fire back to its source.
With Zhi Fu Zi, powerfully tonifies Kidney Yang, for Kidney Yang Deficiency with lower back pain and weakness in the legs and knees.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang, stabilizes Jing and astringes urine.
Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine and benefits the marrow.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
With Qian Shi and Lian Zi, for Kidney Deficiency with diarrhea, spermatorrhea and vaginal discharge.
Stabilizes the Kidneys and astringes Jing.
Tonifies the Kidneys and astringes Jing.

With Qian Shi, reestablishes communication between the Heart and Kidneys to treat nocturnal emissions, premature ejaculation or urinary incontinence due to the failure of the Kidney's storage functions.
Stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes urine and retains essence.
With Qian Shi, tonifies Kidney Qi and strengthens Jing to treat cloudy urine, spermatorrhea, urinary frequency or vaginal discharge.

symptoms: Frequent seminal emissions which are worse with exposure to Cold
Low back and knee pain and coldness
manifestations.tongue: Pale, enlarge and moist with teeth marks
